title: Sussur Sickle
content:
Applies Silenced on impact.

Sussur Sickle Location & Where to Find

Location: Blighted Village Quest: Finish the Masterwork weapon

Sussur Sickle Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 120 Weight: 1 ID: FOR_IncompleteMasterwork_SussurSickle Cannot be crafted from the special 2d4 sickles obtained from Redcaps via Disarming Attack.

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ A
